PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00402011-02-03,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA,  , 
ActExcise Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Stamping and Marking of Tobacco Products Regulations (2011)
PrecisRegulations Amending the STAMPING AND MARKING OF TOBACCO PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (2011), in order to define a "prescribed person" to whom excise stamps can be issued, to establish a formula for calculating the amount of security to be provided to the CRA before excise stamps would be issued to tobacco licensees and prescribed persons, and to add three new criteria with respect to the placement of the excise stamps on tobacco product packages. In addition, certain provisions of the Regulations are transferred to the new Regulations Respecting Prescribed Brands of Manufactured Tobacco and Prescribed Cigarettes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0006 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
AttachmentsAttachment
